model_answer: The video explains increasing efficiency by saying 'By running turbines at lower speeds...'. This is because when turbines run at lower speeds, less kinetic energy needs to be converted, which reduces energy loss.

The major technical issue raised in the video for renewable electricity is that it is intermittent due to weather and geography, leading to surplus energy. The proposed solution is to use pump storage stations to store the excess energy when it is available and use it later when needed.

Answer: A
